name: EUROPEAN FLYERS, S.L
about: European Flyers is a renowned flight training centre with over 30 years of experience, operating from two locations in Spain: Cuatro Vientos Airport in Madrid and the Airfield of Mutxamel in Alicante. Authorized by the AESA under European legislation, we offer comprehensive Airline Transport Pilot and Commercial Helicopter Pilot training. Our modern fleet is equipped with Glass Cockpit technology, including Garmin 1000 systems, and we utilize advanced simulators like the Cessna 172 Nav III. We collaborate with prestigious universities to enhance our training programs. With a strong focus on efficiency, reliability, and safety, European Flyers is a benchmark centre in Europe, dedicated to providing the best aeronautical education to aspiring pilots. Our commitment to excellence ensures that our students receive top-notch training to succeed in their aviation careers.
services:
